snippet.title: Hero Introduction - Blast Nova: Escapist Bin
snippet.description:
Torchlight: Infinite New Season Cube of Rapacity will start in May 9th! 🔥
Pre-register Now: https://torchlight.xd.com/us/ep3?f=2

In the midst of a brutal war, a young genius Trap Master from the Pan Clan found himself separated from his people. This child prodigy was taken in and raised by the dwarf Commander Moto, whom he came to regard as his foster father and affectionately called "Old Man." 

Under Moto's guidance, the boy honed his skills in Ember technology and developed exceptional hands-on abilities. In his hands, even the most insignificant object could be transformed into a powerful explosive.

Although Commander Moto attempted to train the young genius as a Synthetic Troop Master, the boy's passion for explosions could not be contained. Eventually, Moto conceded and allowed him to pursue his own explosive path. This prodigy, known as Bin, became a master at crafting balanced yet dangerous bombs, capable of packing a large number of projectiles into each explosive. His bombs were even designed to actively attach to nearby enemies.

By swiftly throwing multiple bombs and detonating them in a single, devastating instant, Bin could unleash a deadly wave of destruction upon his foes. As he continued to grow and refine his explosive talents, Bin's reputation as a formidable Trap Master spread far and wide, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies and earning the respect of his allies.
